casebody.data:
Luc DORSIN and Ertha Joseph a/k/a Lista Joseph, Appellants,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a The Bank of New York as Trustee for The Certificateholders CWABS, Inc. Asset-Backed Certificates, Series 2006-19, Appellee. No. 4D18-2421 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District. [June 27, 2019]

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
